learning_objectives.description: Use metric units of mass, length, area, volume and capacity in practical situations and convert quantities into larger or smaller units.

subtopic.notes_and_examples:
Units include: mm, cm, m, km; mm², cm², m², km²; mm³, cm³, m³; ml, l; g, kg.
Conversion between units includes:
• between different units of area, e.g. cm² ↔ m²
• between units of volume and capacity, e.g. m³ ↔ litres.
